flawed_nl_solution:
He wants to stay 1000*0.2=<<1000*0.2=200>>200 pounds under the max
So he wants to stay under 1000-200=<<1000-200=804>>804 pounds
That means he can put 804-250=<<804-250=554>>554 pounds on the bar
#### 554

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 804. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
